title: nypd font?
content:
anyone know what font they use on the squad cars? ("courtesy, professionalism, respect") & where i could find it?  
thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140418080745im_/http:/typophile.com/files/nypd%20logo_4300.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [nypd logo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140418080745/http:/typophile.com/files/nypd%20logo.jpg) | 170.39 KB |
author: epetrol

comments.content:
Hi Moira,

reminds me of a black slanted/oblique [City](http://web.archive.org/web/20140418080745/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/city-bq/familytree.html) – though that’s not a cigar.  
F

I was just looking at this the other day. It's a free font called Freshman. I'd recommend Princetown Solid as a better-drawn alternative.

- Lex
